channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Businesses face 'chaos' as EPA aims to repeal its authority over climate pollution
item.description: A lot of companies want the EPA in charge of setting national climate regulations because it helps shield them from lawsuits and creates a predictable...

item.title: Toxicity is a good defense, until it isn't

item.title: D.C.'s crime numbers are all the buzz. But how do we interpret them accurately?
item.description: A range of crime data has been going around to make the argument that Washington, D.C., is — or isn't — safe. We talk to crime experts to make sense o...

item.title: A musical about bigotry arrives at a Kennedy Center transformed by Trump
item.description: Parade , the Tony award-winning musical about the 1915 lynching of a Jewish man, begins its run in Washington, D.C. amid an antisemitic backlash again...

item.title: Gun violence hits Black communities hardest. Trump is rolling back prevention efforts

item.title: Son of Norway's crown princess charged with rape and abuse
item.description: Marius Borg Høiby is charged with 32 offences and could face up to 10 years in prison if found guilty.

item.title: Watch: Two presidents, two very different Oval Office encounters
item.description: Onlookers gasped as Trump and Zelensky's meeting in Washington in February descended into chaos, but times have changed.

item.title: Dangerous seas forecast for US East Coast as Hurricane Erin grows
item.description: The Category 3 storm threatens to bring life-threatening surf and rip currents to the US East Coast.

item.title: Entire church begins two-day journey across Swedish city
item.description: The landmark 113-year-old wooden building is at risk from subsidence and will be moved 5km on giant rolling platforms.

item.title: Hurricane Erin forces evacuations on North Carolina’s Outer Banks, threatens dangerous rip currents
item.description: Hurricane Erin is forcing evacuations on North Carolina’s Outer Banks as it threatens to whip up wild waves and tropical force winds.

item.title: Texas House Democrats return to Austin as GOP redistricting push resumes
item.description: The Texas House gaveled in at noon with Democratic members present, marking an official end to the quorum break.

Canada's Conservative leader projected to win Parliament seat
item.description: Poilievre is projected to win a by-election after losing his seat in another riding in April's general election.

item.title: Texas Democrat locked in state Capitol after refusing police escort
item.description: House leaders mandated police escorts for Democrats to guarantee they return for Wednesday's session.
